title: Visualizing 3D DLC videos on Google Colab
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

I am running a 3D DLC project using two cameras on Google Colab.

I managed to run all steps successfully, and I already have the final triangulation output for my tracked videos. The issue I'm facing is with the: deeplabcut.create_labeled_video_3d

I keep getting this error message: IndexError: list index out of range

I found several posts where others got a similar message and I tried the solutions given but that did not help. These included adding the videotype, making sure that the path is correct ['path of folder with videos and 3d.h5 files'], and properly connecting the skeleton  

I found a post where the author suggested typing in this code when trying to create 3d labelled videos on Colab:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d import Axes3D

However, that did not help with my issue.

Here is the command and the error message
![Error message](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116289297/196988650-e308e621-19bd-4656-83bd-dc17a3137037.png)

This is the 3D config file
![3D-Config-file](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116289297/196982861-03f3ab01-aa6c-4049-a122-6fb2db65966c.png)

the config file for camera-1
![config cam1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116289297/196984781-0c4e8e18-df23-427d-a941-4b2a42c33dfa.PNG)

the config file for camera-2
![config cam2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/116289297/196984867-eb20ce7a-58b5-4c0b-8fa9-ac1519ddad49.PNG)



I hope this covers everything needed

Thanks in advance

### Operating System

Colab

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version: 2.2.3

### DeepLabCut mode

3d

### Device type

gpu

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

_No response_
